text: Aliki Fakate (born 4 September 1985) is a French rugby union lock. Born at Nouméa, New Caledonia, he plays for Montpellier, where he moved from Pro D2 club Lyon OU. He debuted for Lyon on 27 October 2007 against Racing Metro. Fakate also represented France A against Italy A in the Nations Cup on 12 June 2009. ==External links== *"it's rugby" Profile *ESPN Scrum Profile *IRB Profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Lyon OU players Category:People from Nouméa Category:Rugby union locks Category:French rugby union players Category:Rugby union players from Wallis and Futuna
title: Aliki Fakate
